## HTTP and System log Management and Visualization Application
![Apache Codes Bar Chart](./assets/apache_codes_bar_chart.png)
### Express handles data Querying & ECharts handles data Visualization of the MySQL http_logs Schema

This is a Typescript frameworks with [Express.js](https://github.com/expressjs/express) for datasets, [W2UI](https://github.com/vitmalina/w2ui) for drill-down data grids & [Apache ECharts](https://github.com/apache/echarts) for Log Data Visualization in charts, reports & data analysis interfaces for MySQL or MariaDB database.

A Web interface designed for MySQL or MariaDB databases:

[mysql-http-logs](https://github.com/willthefarmer/mysql-http-logs)

[mysql-system-logs](https://github.com/willthefarmer/mysql-system-logs)

[mysql-file-system](https://github.com/willthefarmer/mysql-system-files)

Database schemas are populated by [files-to-mysql](https://github.com/willthefarmer/files-to-mysql)

Code coming soon...
